author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Unicon Optical to issue 40 mln shares to employees and existing shareholders
text:
April 13 (Reuters) - Unicon Optical Co Ltd
* Says it will issue 40 million shares to employees and the existing shareholders, with the tentative price of T$15 per share
* Says 5 million new shares will be offered to the companyâ€™s employees and remaining new shares will be offered to the existing shareholders, who are eligible to purchase 270 shares for every 1,000 shares they hold
Source text in Chinese: goo.gl/rzqB1v
